text: My Bodyguard is a 1980 American family comedy drama movie directed by first time director Tony Bill and starring Adam Baldwin, Joan Cusack, Jennifer Beals, Matt Dillon, Martin Mull, Ruth Gordon, Chris Makepeace and George Wendt. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1980 comedy-drama movies Category:1980s family movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:1980s American drama movies Category:American family comedy movies Category:American family drama movies Category:1980s teen drama movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:1980s high school movies Category:1980s buddy movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:Buddy drama movies Category:Movies about security and surveillance Category:American high school movies
title: My Bodyguard
